bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with jing hua 精滑 , smooth flow of essence/semen . Kai bao xin xiang ding ben cao 開 寶 新 詳 定 本 草 Kai bao chong ding ben cao 開寶重定本草 Substance Entry bu gu zhi 補骨脂：主五勞七傷，風虛冷，骨髓傷敗，腎冷精流 , “It controls the five types of exhaustion and seven types of harm, wind [intruding into a state of] depletion cold, injured bone marrow, and kidney cold with essence/semen flow ”.
